CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" & "&id=" & Id & "&queryid=" & IF($Setup.Conga_batch_setting__c.Query_Selector_Lawyer_Summary_Report__c = "Active", "[LawyerActiveClient]a0p0L00000JZyFw","[LawyerClient]a0p0L00000JZyFmQAL") & "?pv0=" & Id & "~pv1%3D"& $Setup.Conga_batch_setting__c.Business_Unit_Lawyer_Summary__c & "~pv2%3D"& IF($Setup.Conga_batch_setting__c.Type_of_Loan_Lawyer_Summary__c = '', "'Facility Loan'|'Lump-Sum'|'Treatment Loan'|'Treatment Loan 2'|'Assessment'|'Lawyer Loan'", $Setup.Conga_batch_setting__c.Type_of_Loan_Lawyer_Summary__c) & "&templateid=" & IF( $Setup.Conga_batch_setting__c.Business_Unit_Lawyer_Summary__c = "'Rhino'", "a0x0L00000PH6QI", IF( $Setup.Conga_batch_setting__c.Business_Unit_Lawyer_Summary__c = "'Seahold'", "a0x0L00000QCQoYQAX", "a0x0L00000PVUFQ")) & "&defaultpdf=1" & "&attachmentparentid=" & Id & "&ac0=1" & "&sc0=1" & "&sc1=SalesforceFile" & "&DS7=5" & "&qmode=Attachments" & "&returnpath=/lightning/n/Custom_Reports?0.source=alohaHeader"
CustomField.label: Conga Batch Lawyer Summary
